about_the_game:
With the aid of this set, your heroes will develop even faster and the chance of finding magic items in ruins doubles. Duration - 1 month (30 days).

This package includes:
  • Hero`s squad mission duration -10%
  • Chance of finding Magic Items in Ruins +100%
  • Hero experience in battles +50%
